allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Pivot to TributePage generator with Supabase backend

Replace SQLite with Supabase \(PostgreSQL + Storage\). New celebration/tribute
workflow: admin creates celebrations, team contributes via shared links,
system generates shareable tribute pages. Adds Excel employee import,
light/dark mode with Nordic Editorial theme, and complete UI overhaul.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Configure Fly.io build args for Supabase and use --local-only --yes

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
